{"name": "The Gift Of A Helping Hand Charitable Trust", "alternate_name": "", "description": "http://www.facebook.com/tgoahhct2002

Services:

Human Services program targets economically disadvantage families, individuals, seniors, homeless, physically challenging and other individuals who falls within the guidelines of living at or below the poverty-rate.
Provides thousands of families and individuals with basic human needs such as food, clothing, shelter and referral to other agencies that will help them to become self-sufficiency.
Human Services program is a year-round program in which we provide basic human needs for thousands of families and individuals requesting our assistance during these challenging times in Michigan.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.goahhctr.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11066 Beaconsfield Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Yorkshire Woods", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48224", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4219095, "longitude": -82.9471519}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 282-9476", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}]}
